ticket.title: ActionController::Integration::request_via_redirect does not preserve headers over redirects
ticket.original-body:
ActionController::Integration::request_via_redirect does not preserve headers over redirects:
def request_via_redirect(http_method, path, parameters = nil, headers = nil) send(http_method, path, parameters, headers) follow_redirect! while redirect? status end
The call to 'follow_redirect!' is not provided with the original headers, so instead default headers are provided. This is problematic for requests that set an explicit 'Accept' header so that respond_to will act appropriately.
